subject: WAN 2.1 is now live in FLORA
body:
View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/florafauna.ai/wan-21-is-now-live-in-flora?e=047ceaaedc)
Logo


** Choreograph the impossible.
------------------------------------------------------------
https://x.com/florafaunaai/status/1914395606262423924

Introducing WAN 2.1—now available in FLORA.

WAN 2.1 brings state-of-the-art motion to both text-to-video and image-to-video generation.

It’s built for storytellers who want control over movement, physics, and space.

— Choreographed, expressive body movement
— Fluid transitions and lifelike motion
— Realistic physics and simulated interactions
— Spatially aware scenes and dynamic compositions

Whether you’re visualizing a dream sequence or directing full-body choreography—WAN 2.1 moves with meaning.
Create with WAN 2.1 (https://www.florafauna.ai/projects)

https://www.instagram.com/florafaunaai/
https://x.com/florafaunaai?lang=en
